definition: sheet/piece of writing/bound set of bamboo slips used for record keeping (old)/classifier for written items: chapter, article

sentences.english: The Chinese side would like to work together with Arab states to compose a new chapter of China-Arab friendly cooperation.
sentences.chinese: 中方願與阿方共同努力，譜寫中阿友好合作的新篇章。

sentences.english: Macro structure is the higher level semantic structure of a text.
sentences.chinese: 宏觀結構是篇章的高層次語義結構。

sentences.english: Today we are at the beginning of the next chapter of the reinvention of personal transportation.
sentences.chinese: 今天，我們正站在再造個人交通新篇章的開始。

sentences.english: A new chapter for Libya, but will the victors stay united?
sentences.chinese: 利比亞翻開了新篇章，但勝利者仍會團結一致嗎？

sentences.english: Many sections and chapters of acupuncture and moxibustion in The Yellow Emperor's Internal Classic contain a principle of pulse taking.
sentences.chinese: 《內經》的許多鍼灸篇章中都蘊藏着一個診脈原則。

sentences.english: Descent: Freespace is a new chapter in space dogfight sims.
sentences.chinese: 《縱橫太空》開創了太空格鬥模擬遊戲的新篇章。

sentences.english: It's just these heart-thrilling chapters that brought his work world renown.
sentences.chinese: 正因這些扣人心絃的篇章才使得他的作品舉世聞名。

sentences.english: Important books of the Old Testament were written or assembled at roughly the same time.
sentences.chinese: 聖經舊約的重要篇章也大概在這個時期撰寫或者編纂。

sentences.english: Andthat is how we will write the next chapter in the great American story.
sentences.chinese: 唯有如此，我們才能爲偉大的美國曆史書寫新的篇章。

sentences.english: They are also more restrained and conventionalized on the overall text organization and language use.
sentences.chinese: 在篇章組織結構和整體語言使用上也更爲侷限。

sentences.english: This show has a place in television history that we will never forget.
sentences.chinese: 這部劇集正成爲電視史上令人永難忘懷篇章。

sentences.english: Sincerely look forward to your cooperation, to co-creating a glorious future, and composing new writings.
sentences.chinese: 真誠期待和您的合作，共創美好未來，譜寫新的篇章。

sentences.english: The greatest book on sex, love and marriage is in the bible.
sentences.chinese: 關於性，愛和婚姻的最美好的篇章在聖經中。

sentences.english: The choice of different kinds of pattern of sentence are dependent of the cohesion of sentences and contexts.
sentences.chinese: 選擇不同的句式，常同複句關聯和篇章銜接有關。

sentences.english: Clearly the last chapter of the Fezzan is yet to be written.
sentences.chinese: 其實，費讚的最後篇章仍然在寫。

sentences.english: The establishment of China-South Korea diplomatic ties in 1992 opened a new page of bilateral relations.
sentences.chinese: 1992年中韓建交，開啓了兩國關係發展新篇章。

definition: to compose (a piece of music)/(fig.) to create, by one's actions, a narrative (generally one that can be recounted with pride)
start of literary work/opening song of ballad in Tanci style 彈詞|弹词[tan2 ci2]
thick and heavy in colors/to describe sth in colorful language with attention to detail (idiom)
to express (emotions in prose)/a written description (of emotions)
to follow the past and herald the future (idiom); part of a historical transition/forming a bridge between earlier and later stages
surging forward with great momentum/unfolding on a magnificent scale
